snippet: More than 50 people died and scores are missing after three days of continuous monsoon rains contributed to floods and landslides near the Indian border.
abstract: Floods and landslides in Nepal kill 50 people and leave scores missing after three days of continuous monsoon rains.

byline.original: By BHADRA SHARMA and GARDINER HARRIS
byline.contributor: Bhadra Sharma reported from Katmandu, and Gardiner Harris from New Delhi.

lead_paragraph: More than 50 people died and scores are missing after three days of continuous monsoon rains contributed to floods and landslides near the Indian border.

headline.main: Floods and Landslides Kill Dozens and Leave Scores Missing in Nepal
headline.print_headline: Floods and Landslides Kill Dozens and Leave Scores Missing in Nepal
